name: Anthony OLIVER, Sr., Administrator of the Estate of Anthony Daniel Oliver, Jr., Deceased, and Anthony Oliver, Sr., and Sherree Goode, in their Own Right, Respondents v. LOU'S OF UPPER DARBY, INC. and Phoenix Arms Petition of Lou's of Upper Darby, Inc.
name_abbreviation: Oliver v. Lou's of Upper Darby, Inc.

parties: Anthony OLIVER, Sr., Administrator of the Estate of Anthony Daniel Oliver, Jr., Deceased, and Anthony Oliver, Sr., and Sherree Goode, in their Own Right, Respondents v. LOU’S OF UPPER DARBY, INC. and Phoenix Arms Petition of Lou’s of Upper Darby, Inc.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Application for Relief
AND NOW, this 13th day of February, 2008, the Application for Relief is DENIED.
Mr. Justice McCAFFERY dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
942 A.2d 892
Anthony OLIVER, Sr., Administrator of the Estate of Anthony Daniel Oliver, Jr., Deceased, and Anthony Oliver, Sr., and Sherree Goode, in their Own Right, Respondents v. LOU’S OF UPPER DARBY, INC. and Phoenix Arms Petition of Lou’s of Upper Darby, Inc.
No. 148 EM 2006.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 13, 2008.
